title: [main] Update dependencies from dotnet/arcade
body:
This pull request updates the following dependencies

[marker]: <> (Begin:Coherency Updates)
## Coherency Updates

The following updates ensure that dependencies with a *CoherentParentDependency*
attribute were produced in a build used as input to the parent dependency's build.
See [Dependency Description Format](https://github.com/dotnet/arcade/blob/master/Documentation/DependencyDescriptionFormat.md#dependency-description-overview)

[DependencyUpdate]: <> (Begin)

- **Coherency Updates**:
  - **Microsoft.DotNet.XliffTasks**: from 1.0.0-beta.23423.1 to 1.0.0-beta.23426.1 (parent: Microsoft.DotNet.Arcade.Sdk)

[DependencyUpdate]: <> (End)

[marker]: <> (End:Coherency Updates)




[marker]: <> (Begin:fc4faec0-9ee6-43b9-bc7a-08da8607f4c7)

[DependencyUpdate]: <> (Begin)

  - **Microsoft.DotNet.XUnitExtensions**: [from 8.0.0-beta.23425.2 to 8.0.0-beta.23463.1][7]
  - **Microsoft.DotNet.XliffTasks**: [from 1.0.0-beta.23423.1 to 1.0.0-beta.23426.1][8]

[7]: https://github.com/dotnet/arcade/compare/90c167d5c5...1d451c32dd
